    public class FFIClosure
extends Struct
    The libffi closure structure.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FFIClosure

        public FFIClosure(long struct)
        Creates a FFIClosure instance at the specified memory address.

      • FFIClosure

        public FFIClosure(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a FFIClosure instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.

        public static FFIClosure malloc()
        Returns a new FFIClosure instance allocated with MemoryUtil.memAlloc(int). The instance must be explicitly freed.

      • calloc

        public static FFIClosure calloc()
        Returns a new FFIClosure instance allocated with MemoryUtil.memCalloc(int, int). The instance must be explicitly freed.
